review_ru: To describe this hotel as quirky would be fair. Upon arriving at this hotel and seeing the outside I thought this would be an interesting stay as the exterior needed more than a lick of paint. On site the hotel had a reasonable restaurant surving basic ukrainian food and a very small bar in the reception area - but more than adequate for what we needed.
